/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with vibrant red and blue banners, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette of grays and blacks. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, and pedestrians going about their day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, hinting at a touch of nature amidst the cityscape.
